content: He can also perform multiple overhead swings at once ending with a massive jump attack, so it’s safe to assume that unless he’s charging at you, his swings will almost always come out in multiple hits, and you’ll want to be ready to dodge them all first before you move in and attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bullguard.md', within the main section titled 'Bullguard', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Bullguard' and the sub-subsection 'Bullguard Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
He can also perform multiple overhead swings at once ending with a massive jump attack, so it’s safe to assume that unless he’s charging at you, his swings will almost always come out in multiple hits, and you’ll want to be ready to dodge them all first before you move in and attack.
